traits.name: Candle Dependence
entries: The daemon remains on the Material Plane only while the candle that summoned it burns.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The daemon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Nether Step
entries: As its movement for its turn, the candlelight daemon can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided the space it's teleporting to and from are both in dim light or darkness. The daemon doesn't need to see the destination.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the daemon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Slayer's Advantage
entries: The candlelight daemon has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't had a turn in combat.

traits.name: Slayer's Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The candlelight daemon deals an extra 35 {@damage 10d6} damage when it hits a target with an attack and has advantage on the attack roll. With the {@spell suffocate|GHLoE} spell, the daemon deals this damage as extra bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The daemon makes two claw attacks and one gore attack. It can use hurl fire in place of any of these attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage and 4 (1d8 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage and 4 (1d8 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Fire
entries: Ranged Spell atk +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 13 (3d8 damage) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
